entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except southwest 30 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early in the evening. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 7 May 2023
